SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Server

package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Server
  • Class
    Description
    ChatThread
    ChatThread is a class that manage the chat of the game
    ClientListener
    ClientListener is a class that binds every tcp client to the TCPServer
    GameThread
    GameThread is the thread that allows the game to evolve, communicating with the client.
    ImplementerRmi
    ImplementerRmi is a class () that contains the needed elements to let the server manage the connection of the client associated with the player.
    ImplementerTCP
    ImplementerTCP is a class () that contains the needed elements to let the server manage the connection of the client associated with the player.
    InterfaceRMI
    Interface implemented from ServerRMI
    LockClass
    Class used to synchronise all the clients
    SERVER
    This is the main class of the server that create both the serverTCP and the serverRMI
    ServerMessageSorter
    ServerMessageSorter is a queue that allows the player to send message (if they are allowed) and then the server can use this message for a specific task
    ServerPingThread
    Thread that starts the ping interaction and remove the connection of the client if it doesn't get a ping response
    ServerProtocolInterface
    Interface implemented from ImplementerRMI and ImplementerTCP to unify the action of the server with the clients
    ServerRMI
    This is the class that represents the server for RMI that communicate with GameThread in order to perform the commands
    ServerTCP
    ServerTCP Class
    SetUpPhaseThread
    SetUpPhaseThread is the class that make all the player choose the starter card facing, the color of the pawn and the personal objective card simultaneously
    SortPlayerThread
    Thread that allow the connection of different clients simultaneously
    TimerWinner
    Thread used to check if there is only one player left in the game that become automatically the winner
    Turnings
    This enum is used to scan every phase of a player turn or moment
